meanings.sent1: She is supersmart and always gets top grades in school.
meanings.sent2: The scientist came up with a supersmart solution to the complex problem.
meanings.sent3: The supersmart cat figured out how to open the treat jar all by itself.
meanings.sent4: His supersmart strategy in the game was like a master chess player's move.
meanings.sent5: The supersmart detective quickly solved the mystery with ease.

meanings.definition: A person who is exceptionally intelligent or clever.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a supersmart who can solve any puzzle in no time.
meanings.sent2: The supersmart won the science competition with their innovative project.
meanings.sent3: The supersmart at the office always has a witty joke ready for everyone.
meanings.sent4: She was a supersmart in the classroom, always helping others understand difficult concepts.
meanings.sent5: The young supersmart amazed everyone with their ability to learn new languages quickly.
